titleInfo.title: General Dickinson presenting Maneuver Award cup

mods.abstract: General J.M. Dickinson presenting the Maneuver Award cup to Captain Sam Bone for best drilled platoon in the Seventh Regiment competetive drill.

Members of the Seventh Regiment of the Tennessee State Guard participated in the first large-scale maneuvers of the organization held in Cookeville. Most of the maneuvers took place on the farm of Captain Joe Scott. The maneuvers included simulated paratroop landings. Several planes of the Civilan Air Patrol also participated in the maneuvers. The maneuvers were declared a success and proved the State Guard could handle a major defense problem.
